title: Help me configure
a Cisco router
prompt_suggestions.content: Help me configure a Cisco router: provide a step-by-step guide to set up basic network settings.

title: Give me ideas
for optimizing network performance
prompt_suggestions.content: What are 5 best practices for optimizing network performance in a small business environment?

title: Tell me a fun fact
about Cisco's history
prompt_suggestions.content: Tell me a random fun fact about Cisco's history.

title: Show me a configuration example
for a Cisco switch
prompt_suggestions.content: Show me a configuration example for setting up VLANs on a Cisco switch.

title: Explain VPN setup
for remote workers
prompt_suggestions.content: Explain how to set up a VPN on a Cisco router for remote workers.

title: Overcome network issues
give me troubleshooting tips
prompt_suggestions.content: Could you start by asking me about the specific network issues I'm facing and then give me some troubleshooting tips?

rag.template:
Use the following context as your learned knowledge, inside <context></context> XML tags.
<context>
    [context]
</context>

When answer to user:
- If you don't know, just say that you don't know.
- If you don't know when you are not sure, ask for clarification.
Avoid mentioning that you obtained the information from the context.
And answer according to the language of the user's question.

Given the context information, answer the query.
Query: [query]
